SEARCH
Package com.nnk.springboot.controllers

Class CurvePointController

java.lang.Object
com.nnk.springboot.controllers.CurvePointController
@Controller public class CurvePointController extends Object
Controller class for the CurvePoint folder. Page to see the list of all CurvePoint. Page to update CurvePoints. Page to delete CurvePoints.

  • Method Details

    • curvePointDto

      @ModelAttribute("curvePointDto") public CurvePointDto curvePointDto()

    • curvePointList

      @RequestMapping("/curvePoint/list") public String curvePointList(Principal principal, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To get and display the CurvePoint list.
      Parameters:
      principal - the user authenticated.
      model - to parse data to the view.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the curvePoint template folder.

    • addCurvePointForm

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/add") public String addCurvePointForm()
      To display the add page.
      Returns:
      the add.html of the curvePoint template folder.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/curvePoint/validate") public String validate(@Valid @Valid CurvePointDto curvePointDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To get data from the validate form into the add page.
      Parameters:
      curvePointDto - the model to get data form the form inputs.
      result - the validation of the form.
      model - to get data from the view.
      Returns:
      redirect on the curvePoint/list page or stay on the add page if result has an error.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To display the update page.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the CurvePoint to update parsed.
      model - the CurvePoint's attributes to parse for the view.
      Returns:
      the update.html of the curvePoint template folder.

    • updateCurvePoint

      @PostMapping("/curvePoint/update/{id}") public String updateCurvePoint(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @Valid @Valid CurvePointDto curvePointDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      To perform the update form of the page.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the CurvePoint parsed into the url of the page with showUpdateForm method.
      curvePointDto - the Dto create after submit of the form to update the CurvePoint.
      result - to catch any errors and return the related error message.
      model - to get data from the form.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the curvePoint template folder or stay on the update page if result has an error.

    • deleteCurvePoint

      @GetMapping("/curvePoint/delete/{id}") public String deleteCurvePoint(@PathVariable("id") Integer id)
      Manage the delete button. To delete the CurvePoint. Call the deleteById of the curvePointService to delete the CurvePoint linked.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the CurvePoint linked.
      Returns:
      the list.html of the curvePoint template folder.
